name: Hot Cocoa Brownies
description: Rich Brownies with Toasted Marshmallow Topping
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F and grease a 9×9-inch pan
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, cocoa powder, salt, espresso powder, baking powder, hot cocoa mix, milk powder, and vanilla
In a separate bowl, cream the butter and sugar together until smooth; microwave briefly in intervals until the sugar dissolves and mixture becomes glossy
Combine the egg mixture with the butter mixture and stir gently until just combined (do not overmix)
Add the flour and mix until barely combined
Pour batter into the prepared pan and bake for 25 minutes
Remove from the oven, sprinkle marshmallows evenly over the top, and return to bake for an additional 10–15 minutes, or until marshmallows are lightly toasted and brownies are done
